Name: Grass Pledge
Effect: Area Move. Reduce by 1 the Dexterity of those affected. This Effect Targets the Battle Field: Entry Hazard. Reduce by 1 the Dexterity of Target's that enter the battlefield. Pokemon with Immunity to Ground are not affected.
Description: The Pok√©mon chants to invoke the power of grass. Its pledge is heard and then soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.
